column4: $ sudo ifcontfig wlan0 up SIOCSIFFLAGS: Operation not possibel duet to RF-kill   -  ---- WHAT DOES THIS MEAN?
do you have a wireless radio on/off switch on your computer?
might be that you're trying to bring up an interface with RF deactivated on it
not sure. "rfkill list" shows that everything is blocked with "yes" everywhere. I am trying to "sudo rfkill unblock 1" to get them unblocked
